name: get_quotes_by_source
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool quotes_api.
Tool description: The Quotes API is a powerful and comprehensive resource, providing access to over 190,000 unique quotes spanning a wide range of topics and sources. Designed with user experience and versatility in mind, the API offers a variety of endpoints to cater to different use cases and requirements, making it an ideal choice for developers, content creators, and enthusiasts alike.
API description: Fetches quotes from a given source using the Quotes API on RapidAPI.

source.description: The source from which to fetch quotes.
